features: Directly call your loved ones via 4 large picture buttons, without search in the phonebook, easy operation, Special design for advanced age elderly, Dementia, Alzheimer's and kids who can't read yet.
Simple operating system with minimalist UI, No have complex features, Build the easiest cell phone to focus on calling.
1050mAh battery, Long time standby with a easy cradle charger, just place the phone on its stand, and it starts charging!
Powerful speaker with clear and loud sound, suitable for older users; HAC Compatible, good for user with hearing aid devices.
Additional SOS button, Press and hold SOS Button for help in case of the emergency, Automatic dialing to each emergency contact in a loop until the call is answered.
User Friendly Accessories: Easyfone neck lanyard, Picture cutting adapter for buttons, Detailed user manual and Easy charging dock.

Unlocked to T-Mobile, MetroPCS, SpeedTalk and Tello Mobile, This phone work great with SpeedTalk (SIM Card Included) which running on T-Mobile network, Variety of plans starting at $5 a month, Option for Keep your existing phone number or Get a New phone number.
Please note that this phone is NOT compatible with AT&T, Cricket or with any CDMA Networks like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost Mobile.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Make it Easiest-to-Use Easyfone T6 is a 4G simplest cell phone, The phone has 4 unique large picture button which are convenient for making calls. Clear Sound and Big battery long time standby with Simplest Operating System and Improve Screen Technology are designed to be senior user-friendly. It's a perfect phone for advanced age elderly, Dementia, Alzheimer's and kids who can't read yet.

4G Unlocked to T-Mobile, MetroPCS, SpeedTalk, Tello and RedPocket GSMT SIM Card.This phone come with a new SpeedTalk SIM Card which running on T-Mobile network. Variety of plans for choose.This phone is NOT Compatible with AT&T, Cricket or with CDMA Networks like Verizon, Sprint, and Boost Mobile.

An unlocked unique cell phone with a host of never before features to help your beloved stay connected, independent & safe... Easiest-to-Use Cell Phone Easyfone offers communication terminals for seniors seeking for simple, innovative and safe solutions. Or just want a simple but reliable phone for both daily use or just for emergency. Designed to simplify the user experience, By levering technology we make sure they can live an active and independent life. Easiest-to-Use | Large Picture Buttons | Cradle Charger | SOS Button Special Design for Advanced Age Elderly, Dementia, Alzheimer's and Kids who can't read yet Directly call your love ones via 4 picture buttons, without search in the phonebook.Powerful speaker with clear and loud sound, suitable for older users; HAC Compatible, good for user with hearing aid devices.1050mAh real capacity battery, Long time standby with a easy cradle charger.Emergency SOS button, For help in case of the emergency.

Product Highlight Picture Button for Dialing Easier See the picture and make the call.Easy to set numbers for the button.Easy to cut picture with cutting adapter.Easy to install picture into the button. NOTE: Pictures need to be printed by yourself Simplest Operating System Newly defined keys combined with a Simplest operating system, easier to use.No have complex features, Build the easiest cell phone to focus on calling.Improve Screen Technology, glare-free display, easy on the eyes. Easy Charging Dock Big size charging dock for charing easilyMore suitable for elderly usersGood looking on the desk

Additional SOS Button SOS Call & SOS message send to each 5 SOS contacts.Dialing to each emergency contact in a loop until the call is answered.If No Need, User can turn off this feature in Setting. Clear and Loud Sound Powerful speakers ensure that every calls is clear and loud.Cutting Edge M4/T4 Hearing Aid CompatibilityIdeal for the customers with hearing aid devices. User Friendly Accessories Detailed user manualEasy charging dockPicture cutting adapter for buttonsEasyfone neck lanyard

Memory Loss & Difficulty making phone calls ? When we set out to create an accessible Cell phone for people with memory loss, it was necessary to us that we consult the community. Through lengthy feedback and collaboration with people living with memory loss, we developed a unique personal cellphone device that does more simply than a regular senior cell phone, After helping complete the basic settings, the user can use it independently.

You may want to know & Product Specification Dial others than 4 buttons You can use dial Pad function to dial other numbers than 4 picture buttons，Menu - Tools - Dial Pad and use UP/Down and YES button to select numbers and make calls; Call history will be saved. Press the Yes button in the standby interface to quickly enter the call log page and make it easy to dial the number again. How to do when phone freezes? Open the back cover, remove the battery, reinstall the battery, and then turn on the phone. The problem will be solved. Can press one button to call？ Sure, After you stored a number for each picture button，Long press the picture button for one button to call. How to activate new SIM card？ The package included a new SpeedTalk SIM card which running on T-mobile Network and allow you keep your existing phone number. The best way to activate SIM card is call to SpeedTalk customer help team: 13107070000 to ask them to activate and select the plan and start your service. Can I use other SIM card? If you have activated and using T-mobile/ MetrobyT-mobile/RedPocket GSMT/Tello SIM Card, You can use the SIM card directly on this phone and its will work great. ****************************** ****************************************************************************************************************************** Speaker & Receiver Φ26mm Big Speaker & AAC HAC Receiver Screen Size & Camera 1.8 inch TFT & No have camera Hearing Aid Compatible Yes, M4/T4 Cellular Technology 4G Bands B1/2/3/4/5/7/12/17/20/66 and VoLte enable Phonebook Capacity 4 Speed Dial contacts Battery 1050mAh Real Capacity Battery Phone & Box Weight 82g & 326g Talking & Standby Time 5.5 & 72+ hours Internet Browser Not support Sim Card Request 1* Nano size sim card (Package included a Speedtalk SIM card, Plans start at 5USD a month)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Handicap Phone!
reviews.reviewText: I don't understand the negative reviews of this phone. It's awesome! Just what a handicapped person needs! It's very good quality (all phones are plastic), easy to setup, easy to use, excellent service with Consumer Cellular, great battery life, & excellent 2-way audio over speakerphone. No complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No one can make cell phones for impaired seniors anymore...
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace the house phone in my mother's house. She is in her 80s, has dementia, and simply can't see well. She can barely operate the house phone and there are too many telemarketers calling. It was too much money every month just to be harrassed by spammers. After looking all over the place, this phone seemed good with less features and big easy to use buttons for simplicity when calling. Everything else I looked at was too complicated for her. What ever happened to simple phones for elderly people? Well, this phone really turned out to be way too small. The big buttons aren't that big when you realize how small the phone is. After a few weeks, the thing just stopped working. When powered all the way up, just unplug it and it is dead as a door nail. It is garbage. Useless garbage. Why can't anyone just make a simple, easy to use cell phone for seniors? Stop with all the bells and whistles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Adult phone for seniors
reviews.reviewText: I am giving this phone a 3 star which might be more a little generous. I bought this phone for my Aunt this has Alzheimer dementia. The battery life does last pretty long, but one drop and it will stop working properly. I did not find any phone case for this phone to prevent this issue. I tried to contact tech support but I did not receive any reply, so I bought a second phone, and find my Aunt hit the wrong button and the SOS feature sent off. I would say overall its a cheap phone in cost, but my Aunt did get 6 months out of the phone and for me that was a win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Microphone not working
reviews.reviewText: This phone is perfect for my 90 year old Mom ! but it only worked one day. The microphone is not working anymore, My Mom can hear us when we call her but we CAN’T hear her! It’s a very easy phone so we are going to give it a second chance, I amSending back and getting another! I’ll keep you posted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 1st one shattered 2nd one didn't work out of box
reviews.reviewText: 1st one shattered when dropped from about 9inches from the ground. 2nd one didn't work out of box. This seems to be the only option for my 98 year old blind uncle. The first one worked great for a few months. Then he dropped it while pulling his shoes on and the plastic cracked and the screen stopped working.The second one didn't work out of box, spent several hours trying to get sound on the outbound with no success.It's a good design but bad execution. If they made it with better materials and maybe had a drop case available for it I'd try another

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Back of phone
reviews.reviewText: Couldn't get the back off the phone to put in battery. Several people tried but it didn't happen. Afraid to pry it off. Could be a nice phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The theory of this phone is great, however it has horrible ability to connect. I would have to call 3-5 times before it connected and rang. The same was happening the other way. Not reliable!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Phone is perfect for seniors
reviews.reviewText: This phone is ideal for seniors. Unfortunately, battery life is a couple hours.
Très pratique pour une personne handicapée, une fois mis en service par une personne valide.Mais très grosse galère pour ouvrir l'arrière de l'appareil, afin d'insérer la carte sim et la batterie.
